text:
Luis Miguel González Bosé (born April 3, 1956), usually known as Miguel Bosé, is a Panamanian-born Spanish pop new wave singer and actor. He was born in Panama City. He is known for his albums "Papito" and "Papitwo". His mother was Spanish actress and model Lucia Bosè.
Bosé was honoured as the Latin Recording Academy Person of the Year on November 20, 2013.

annotations.surface_form: Latin Recording Academy Person of the Year
